xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.12 Hetuduka, Parittattika » 1.12.2 Mahaggatapada » 1.12.2.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Parittattika
Mahaggatapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
369.
789Hetu mahaggato dhammo hetussa mahaggatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
370.
790Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
791Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
792Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
793(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetvādiup1.12.3 Appamāṇapada >>
